CustomField.description: Field to track whether a transaction and its related Transaction Items were posted to External System. It will have either Values 'Submitted' or 'Resubmit'. All the transactions with 'Resubmit' will be scheduled for resubmission.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field to track whether a transaction and its related Transaction Items were posted to External System. It will have either Values 'Submitted' or 'Resubmit'. All the transactions with 'Resubmit' will be scheduled for resubmission.
CustomField.label: Submission Status
